full_summary:
# Tender Notice: 5P313-220156 Zero Turn Mower

## Tender Overview

The Parks Canada Agency (PCA) is seeking to acquire an electric Zero Turn Mower to be used for mowing grass at 1000 Islands National Park. This tender aims to replace a diesel internal combustion powered unit with a more environmentally friendly solution as part of the Federal Government's Greening Inititative.

## Project Details

* **Title of Work**: Supply of Zero Turn Mower
* **Notice Number**: WS3843075047-Doc3859647202
* **Publication Date**: February 6, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 22, 2023 2:00 PM (noon)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 3, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31, 2023

## Technical Specifications

The equipment must meet all technical specifications outlined in Annex “A” of the Request for Proposals. Interested bidders are required to review the specifications carefully and ensure that their submitted bid meets the required criteria.

## Tendering Details

* **Method of Tendering**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Evaluation Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)
* **Trade Agreements**: None

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Ocheoha, Yvonne (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: <yvonne.ocheoha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15331086?extsite=MTUzMzEwODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15331086?extsite=MTUzMzEwODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
